QuestData.Title: Terms of Service
QuestData.Description: Grimtotem need weapons! The Horde, empowered by their Warchief and with the help of their new goblin allies, have amassed powerful weaponry. Our armaments are simply no match for their firepower. Supply the Grimtotem with strong weapons and we will work together to destroy the Horde!$B$BThese are our demands! Supply the Grimtotem and we will fight for the Alliance!
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver the Grimtotem Terms of Service to Force Commander Valen at Northwatch Expedition Base Camp in Stonetalon Mountains.
QuestData.RewardText: Weapons, eh?$B$B<Force Commander Valen sighs.>$B$BI'm about to make an executive decision here, $n. Let's hope this pays off, else King Wrynn will have my head!
